Package bomberman.model.bomb

Class Bomb

  • java.lang.Object
    • bomberman.model.GameElement
      • bomberman.model.tile.AbstractTile
        • bomberman.model.bomb.Bomb
  • public class Bomb
extends AbstractTile
    Represents a bomb.
    Author:
    Felix Bachmann

    • Constructor Detail

      • Bomb

        public Bomb​(java.lang.String spriteName,
            int radius,
            int ticks,
            TileCoordinate tileCoord,
            int explosionTicks,
            Player player)
        Creates a new bomb and sets the bomb state to TICKING.
        Parameters:
        spriteName - the name of the sprite on disk used for rendering bombs
        radius - the radius of an explosion of this bomb
        ticks - the amount of ticks this bomb needs until it explodes
        tileCoord - the coordinate of the tile at which this bomb is located
        explosionTicks - the amount of ticks this bomb needs for the explosion to take place
        player - the player which planted this bomb

      • getAffectedTileCoordinates

        public java.util.List<TileCoordinate> getAffectedTileCoordinates()
        Returns the tile coordinates of the tiles inside this bombs radius.
        Returns:
        the affected tile coordinates

      • tick

        public void tick()
        If the bomb is ticking, ticks down the tick counter of this bomb. If the counter reaches 0 the bomb will explode. If the bomb is exploding, the explosion tick counter will be counted down. If the counter reaches 0 the bomb will stop exploding.
